name: The boots of the miles walked
data: It increases the users strength poorly.
It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence poorly.
It has adequate armour class for its type (tiny in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'razor edge'.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'lightsword'.
